name: Panty Party
description: Panty Party is a fast-paced battle game. Fly as a panty in the street and in-between buildings. Search for the enemy panties and kick their bad ♥♥♥!
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7+ Prozessor: 3.4 GHz Dual Core Processor Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM Grafik: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities Speicherplatz: 2 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: Do not support screen aspect ration 4:3. Minimum game window size 960 x 544.
